description:
Allows payment link generation for Qiwi. 

Adds Workflow action (Payment tab) called [Qiwi Кошелёк Lite] Create payment link, which generates link that you can use in next step "Open an external website" or save for later.

Also plugin adds action [Qiwi Кошелёк Lite] Signature check that allow you to check authenticity of payment notification (more information here https://developer.qiwi.com/ru/p2p-payments/#notifications_auth)

If you have any questions about plugin use - feel free to contact me in Telegram @den_mok
---------------------------------------------
Если у вас возникли вопросы по использованию плагина - не стесняйтесь задать их мне в Телеграм @den_mok
name: Qiwi Кошелек [Lite]
